reviews.review:
JUEGASO, hace cosas que otros shooters no hacen... en la ACTUALIDAD, cambia el juego en cada capitulo, como lo seria el auto, la arena, el control de las hormigas, las armas, etc, su diseÃ±o de niveles es excelente, sus ficicas son increibles, son tan divertidas, por algo pusieron la pistola anti gravedad mejorada, los graficos se ven hermosos y las interacciones son variadas

Venia con espectativas altas, digo half life 1 es muy divertido shooter, pero pense que no seria tan terrorifico, o tan bueno, tan interactivo, pero cerre la boca con tan solo ver la parte de la lata, vienes por el re nombre, continuas por las mecanicas y terminas por la historia
now therss two halfs? whole life
One of the best games of it's time!
speedrunning is just not as good as old engine but it still is a timeless valve game with an amazing plot and immersive experience
A true classic which make today's gaming standards look like a joke.

bad pacing, mediocre gunplay, limited weapons, and too many boring puzzles that break the flow of the game. Really only picks up until the last third of the game from nova prospekt to the very end of the game. Revolutionary, yes, but Valve has done better before, and after, HL2
Pedazo de juego de mierda, un lore todo el Half-Life amigo de los mejores juegos de mi puta infancia
only played it to see alyx she's hot af

haha guy with glasses go swoosh

This is one of the best story-based shooters I have ever played, It makes me realise how restrictive and un-immersive pre-rendered cut scenes are. In-world events are so much more free-flowing. The story isn't complicated and if you zone out easily you can very quickly pick it back up. The voice acting and animation are also surprisingly much better than many of the games I've played recently, especially for its time. As someone with over 600+ hours on G-Mod, it's fun to see where all the textures come, speaking of textures the old slightly poorly rendered graphics add to the eeriness as a whole. The puzzles are varied and the game-play never gets repetitive. 

Sensational!

Crowbar simulator, Â¿Que mas quieres en esta vida?

One of the best games ever created for any platform, period. Valve made such a solid physics-based game that it holds up solidly almost two decades later. The graphics, while dated at this point, remained ahead of their time for years after the game was released. The rock-solid physics based puzzles and gameplay are unrivaled today, with the only real contender being the physics sandbox presented by BotW. Valve took the winning gameplay loop from the original HL and just added on - more lore, more weapons, more enemies, larger maps, better character models, better AI... they took what worked and ran with it. The game is an incredible sequel in an incredible franchise.

Half life 2 is one of the my favourite games of all time, and one of the best games of all time, its a vary fun game to play. the characters are some of the best in all of gaming and so is the story. the combine are great things to fight against. buy it, its only like 10 bucks

I missed out on this when it came out, but I'm glad I made the purchase. More than just a sequel, this is a great game on its own merits, even today. The graphics might be a little dated, although ahead of their own time, but the story and game play absolutely stand up against newer puzzler/fps titles (albeit the enemy and squad AI is a bit weak). Puzzles which will have you tearing out your hair at first, but once solved, don't frustrate. Meaty weapons, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. Intense battles which favour thinking and strategy over charging forth guns-a-blazing, but still involved enough to make you feel like you're not just sneaking around taking pot shots. Cutscenes and exposition blended in seamlessly with the gameplay. May have to get HL2 Episodes 1 and 2. Shame that HL3 seems to not be on the cards, maybe ever :(
